name: Comet Search Redirect
short_description: Smart search redirection for Comet browser - Single words go to Google, multi-word queries stay on Perplexity AI

permissions_justification.tabs: Required to redirect search tabs from Perplexity to Google
permissions_justification.webNavigation: Needed to detect navigation on Perplexity.ai and trigger smart redirects
permissions_justification.storage: Used to save user preferences and track redirect statistics

Real-World Examples - Grid showing specific search examples and their routing destinations
Power User Features - Advanced debugging capabilities and monitoring tools

version_info.release_notes: Initial release with smart search redirection, statistics tracking, and debug mode
